title: LOL installer not working
body:
Hey guys,
I've played LOL for a year or so and I've stopped for awhile (6 months i think), 
So yeh i deleted it off my mac and now i want to come back but everytime i try to download it off the official website the result is always "Server not found" or "Please check if you have the right website etc." 
"http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/Mac_ShellInstaller/OC1/League%20of%20Legends%20OC1.dmg" this just appears 
Can someone please help me fix this problem?

replies.body:
Hey Guys idk whether you guys have found a fix yet or not. But this let me download it and open it at least (currently updating so not playing yet).
http://puu.sh/ehbkv/7592745e6c.png 
This i am pretty sure is the windows instructions but just in case you guys arent too sure what i did was:
1. Go to System Preferences
2. Go to Network
3. Go to Advanced
4. Go to DNS
5. Press the plus button and add 8.8.8.8
6. Press the plus button and add 8.8.4.4
7. Press Ok
8. Press Apply.

Then try redownloading. worked for me.
FYI i have no clue how this works because I got this from another forum and the OP had no clue why this works.
Thankyou Fatninja, Without you lol career would be finished, Here have another 3 cookies, Btw everyone this actually works.{{summoner:30}}

> [{quoted}](name=FatNinja12345,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=Xf9hAM08,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-10T15:35:33.079+0000)
>
> Hey Guys idk whether you guys have found a fix yet or not. But this let me download it and open it at least (currently updating so not playing yet).
> http://puu.sh/ehbkv/7592745e6c.png 
> This i am pretty sure is the windows instructions but just in case you guys arent too sure what i did was:
> 1. Go to System Preferences
> 2. Go to Network
> 3. Go to Advanced
> 4. Go to DNS
> 5. Press the plus button and add 8.8.8.8
> 6. Press the plus button and add 8.8.4.4
> 7. Press Ok
> 8. Press Apply.
> 
> Then try redownloading. worked for me.
> FYI i have no clue how this works because I got this from another forum and the OP had no clue why this works.

Idk why this worked but it does, thank you so much dude, your the best. Here have a cookie {{item:2052}}
yeah i am having this same problem now

Hi Panda, 

I'm having the same exact problem. Did you end fixing the problem? If you did please tell how.

Thank you
